active_incidents.title: Pasting via Cmd/Ctrl + V not working

notes.body:
We are currently investigating an issue which is preventing users from pasting via Ctrl + V (Windows/Linux) and Cmd + C (MacOS). We'll be back with another updates as soon as we know more. 
In the meantime, users can workaround this issue by pasting via mouse (right click to open context menu + select Paste).
